item.title: Data Engineering project - Taiwan Stock Market Data Analysis - From Crawler to Dashboard
item.description: Product Architecture Figure 1 Product Architeture. Product Taiwan stock market Visualize analysis Dashboard Figure 2 Chip Analysis example. GET: (http://172.232.132.138:5000/) Send me your email address, then I will create an account for you to access the dashboard. Taiwan stock market data API GET: (http://testapi.serveirc.com/docs#/) | Parameter | Description | |:-------------------:|:--------------------:| | stock_id | code of the stock | | start_date | start time | | end_date | end time | Data Engineering Using distributed technology, rabbitMQ, flower, and celery, to collect the data from Taiwan Stock Exchange, Taipei Exchange, and Taiwan Futures Exchange.
